tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to out-of-bounds memory access due to missing minimum-size checks in the `parseAuthData` function (in the underlying c++ library). When handling malformed or truncated authentication data, the parser may read beyond buffer boundaries, potentially leading to crashes, undefined behaviour, or further memory-corruption issues.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@trustwallet/wallet-core` library to a patch version.
